div.p: I used to be married, I’m divorced, I’ve got 2 daughters one’s 16, one’s 17; unfortunately the 17 year old has got dyslexia but she’s coping very well
with it because nowadays they’ve got things in place at school that catch these things earlier which has allowed her to learn the skills to go off to college
and do a BTEC in Animal Care. I live with my parents at the moment simply because I’m in between moving from house to house
that’s the reason why so it’s nice sometimes you can go back to your parents. I like painting, I didn’t say I was good at it, I like painting
I love it, it’s something I like because I can get lost in it, I can’t read books so I hide behind a paintbrush, I’m not good I just love it.
